meanings.definition: A person with an interest or concern in something, especially a business.
meanings.sent1: The stakeholders in the company were excited about the new product launch.
meanings.sent2: The stakeholders gathered to discuss the future of the business.
meanings.sent3: The stakeholders joked about starting their own business together.
meanings.sent4: The stakeholders held the success of the company in their hands.
meanings.sent5: The stakeholders' support was crucial for the business to thrive.

meanings.definition: A person or group that has an investment, share, or involvement in a particular organization or system.
meanings.sent1: The stakeholders invested in the project to see it succeed.
meanings.sent2: The stakeholders' shares in the company increased in value.
meanings.sent3: The stakeholders planned a team-building retreat for fun.
meanings.sent4: The stakeholders' involvement shaped the direction of the organization.
meanings.sent5: The stakeholders' commitment was evident in their actions.
